member.summary: Get the list of contracts registered in the memory cache.
member.returns: It'll return only one contract after a search in memory cache using the id itself.

member.returns: It'll save and return the contract object if the modelState is valid or it'll return status code of bad request and message of data annotations required, for example

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.ContractControler.Put(WebAPI.Data.DataContext,WebAPI.Models.Contract)
member.returns: It'll edit and return the contract object if the modelState is valid or it'll return status code of bad request and message of data annotations required, for example

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.ContractControler.Delete(WebAPI.Data.DataContext,System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete a contract specified using id itself.
member.returns: It'll delete and return success message or it'll dont delete and return error message

members.member:
It's a private method to serve this class to fill the Status property
Due Date Current Date /// Pay Date
It'll return message string open if due data is after / equals then currenty date or It'll return message string late if due data is previous than current date (today) or it'll return message ok if the pay date has any value indepoendente if due date or current date has any value

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.ContractControler.GetListInstallmentss(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{WebAPI.Models.Installments})
member.summary: Get a installments list to populate object Installments related in contract object
member.returns: It'll return installments list to add 30 days to due date if quantity of plots is bigger than 1
